channel.title: How...?
channel.description:
Ok so i want to make a separate money system using
[code]item = 7774 Reward_tokenYellow item = 7775 Reward_tokenRed item = 7776 Reward_tokenBlue[/code]
Red being 1b Blue being 100m Yellow being 10m
Im using kilop-scape as a source and i wanna know how i would go about doing this?
can somebody tell me or help out? maybe post a link
Thank you very much

item.title: How...?
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

Travas:

You mean having those items; 7774, 7775, 7776, have custom names?

No like when you talk to a banker you can exchange 1b for a red token and it will equal that amount of money. or if you have 10m you get a yellow or 100m you get blue.

Read full topic
